docs.comment:
/**
 * Return a descriptor removing the value and returning a getter
 * The getter will return a .bind version of the function
 * and memoize the result against a symbol on the instance
 */
docs.description:
Return a descriptor removing the value and returning a getter
The getter will return a .bind version of the function
and memoize the result against a symbol on the instance
docs.name: boundMethod

docs.description: Use boundMethod to bind all methods on the target.prototype

resolve

params.description:
value that the returned promise will be resolved with
  Useful for tooling.
params.name: value

returns.description:
a promise that will become fulfilled with the given
  `value`

docs.name: all

params.description:
optional string for labeling the promise.
  Useful for tooling.
params.name: label

returns.description:
promise that is fulfilled when all `promises` have been
  fulfilled, or rejected if any of them become rejected.

docs.name: race

params.description:
array of promises to observe
  Useful for tooling.
params.name: promises

returns.description:
a promise which settles in the same way as the first passed
  promise to settle.

docs.name: reject

params.description:
value that the returned promise will be rejected with.
  Useful for tooling.
params.name: reason

returns.description: a promise rejected with the given `reason`.
